title: Vivian Gray signs with Phoenix Mercury - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Vivian Gray signs with Phoenix Mercury - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: LUBBOCK, Texas â€“ Texas Tech Lady Raider guard Vivian Gray has signed a free agent agreement with the Phoenix Mercury that will send the four-time All-America selection to training camp next week with the organization.
